North_Little_Rock.James Peter Faucette House: The James Peter Faucette House is a historic house at 316 West Fourth Street in North Little Rock, Arkansas. It is a 2-1/2 story brick structure, roughly square in shape, with a projecting gabled section at the left of its front (southern) facade. A single-story porch extends across the front, supported by grouped square fluted columns on brick piers, with a balustrade across the top.
